pageTitle: Claim start date after Statutory Sick Pay

claimStartDateAfterSsp.label: Do you want to claim from %s?
claimStartDateAfterSsp.hint: This is the day after your Statutory Sick Pay end date. You can choose a later date, but you cannot get New Style ESA and Statutory Sick Pay at the same time.

errors.required: Select yes if you want to claim from the day after your Statutory Sick Pay end date
